General.Name: Fabryka Farb i Lakierów ŚNIEŻKA SA
General.Description: Fabryka Farb i Lakierów Sniezka SA engages in the production and sale of paints, varnishes, solvents, adhesives, putties, building insulation system, and anti-corrosion products in Poland, Hungary, Ukraine, Belarus, and internationally. The company primarily provides its products under the Magnat, Sniezka Vidaron, Rafil, Foveo-Tech, Ultra biel and Beston brands. It also wholesales and retails in building materials. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
